DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
HasFillings
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the Filling Relationship that is used to assign Elements as Fillings for this Opening Element. The Opening Element can be filled with zero-to-many Elements.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either _PredefinedType_ is unset or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED or _PredefinedType_.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcOpeningElementTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcOpeningElementTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS(SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))
